s1: userNote - added programming note reminding that selections of certain options terminate in the live survey.

s6a: labels updated to match survey text; created multi-variable NET '_NET_S6aAny' combining S6ar1-S6ar8; added user note '(Select all that apply)'; set surveySection to SCREENER and baseText to 'Asked if respondent is Hispanic or Latino'.
s7: labels - Shortened and cleaned row labels to match survey text; added user note '(Select all that apply)'.
s7: no_change in structure - this is a multi-select binary-flag question so no T2B or NETs were added.
s9: labels updated to match survey text and questionText rewritten for clarity; kept as mean_rows and added userNote explaining data entry and sum-to-S8 behavior (no NETs or T2B created).
